com.simplegeo.client
Class AbstractSimpleGeoClient

java.lang.Object
  com.simplegeo.client.AbstractSimpleGeoClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISimpleGeoClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleGeoContextClient, SimpleGeoPlacesClient
public abstract class AbstractSimpleGeoClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISimpleGeoClient

Extracts as much common code as possible between the SimpleGeoClient and the SimpleGeoURLConnClient.

Author:
Casey Crites

Method Detail

setHandler

public void setHandler(ISimpleGeoClient.Handler type,
                       ISimpleGeoJSONHandler handler)
Set the handler per type. This is useful if subclasses or implementations of the model objects change and the response object needs to be built differently.

Parameters:
type - the Handler type to override
handler - the handler must implement ISimpleGeoJSONHandler.
